Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 123rd overall pick, by Minnesota in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/5/2019, off Richard Baeza (WAS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2019, off Robert Siems (BAL)...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/16/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2020, hitting .387 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/11/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Milwaukee on 4/2/2021...
